user.description: The original AI alignment person.  Missing punctuation at the end of a sentence means it's humor.  If you're not sure, it's also very likely humor.

fullText:
Reproduced after creating a fresh ChatGPT account.  (I wanted logs, so didn't use temporary chat.)

Alignment-by-default is falsified; ChatGPT's knowledge and verbal behavior about right actions is not hooked up to its decisionmaking.  It knows, but doesn't care. https://t.co/JCLJwfE7UV
